title: Russia-N Korea Defence Deal Could Create Friction With China: US Officer
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin's mutual defence agreement with North Korea has the potential to create friction with China, which has long been the reclusive state's main ally, the top U.S. military officer said on Sunday.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin's mutual defence agreement with North Korea has the potential to create friction with China, which has long been the reclusive state's main ally, the top U.S. military officer said on Sunday.

title: Indian-Origin Man, 32, Shot Dead In Texas Came To US 8 Months Ago
content: In a tragic incident, a 32-year-old Indian-origin man was fatally shot during a robbery at a convenience store in the US state of Texas.
summary: In a tragic incident, a 32-year-old Indian-origin man was fatally shot during a robbery at a convenience store in the US state of Texas.

title: Russia Pins Blame On US For Deadly Missile Attack On Crimea That Killed 4
content: Russia on Sunday said the United States had responsibility for a Ukrainian missile attack on Russian-annexed Crimea, which it said killed four people, including two children, and wounded over 100.
summary: Russia on Sunday said the United States had responsibility for a Ukrainian missile attack on Russian-annexed Crimea, which it said killed four people, including two children, and wounded over 100.

title: Thousands Participate In Yoga Day Events In Texas, Nearby States Amid Heat
content: Amidst the scorching Texas heat, thousands of yoga enthusiasts gathered across the state to embrace the timeless practice of yoga during the month-long celebrations of the 10th International Day of Yoga 2024.
summary: Amidst the scorching Texas heat, thousands of yoga enthusiasts gathered across the state to embrace the timeless practice of yoga during the month-long celebrations of the 10th International Day of Yoga 2024.

title: Iran-Backed Houthis Target 2 Ships In Red Sea, Indian Ocean
content: A drone attack damaged a merchant ship in the Red Sea near Yemen Sunday, two maritime security agencies said, as Iran-backed Houthi rebels announced naval attacks in the vital trade route.
summary: A drone attack damaged a merchant ship in the Red Sea near Yemen Sunday, two maritime security agencies said, as Iran-backed Houthi rebels announced naval attacks in the vital trade route.

title: Universal Practice: S Jaishankar Leads Yoga Day Celebrations In Abu Dhabi
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Sunday participated in the 10th International Day of Yoga celebrations in Abu Dhabi.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Sunday participated in the 10th International Day of Yoga celebrations in Abu Dhabi.

title: 8 Palestinians Killed In Israeli Strike At Gaza Aid Centre, Say Witnesses
content: Eight Palestinians were killed on Sunday in an Israeli airstrike on a training college near Gaza City being used to distribute aid, Palestinian witnesses said, as Israeli tanks pushed further into the southern city of Rafah.
summary: Eight Palestinians were killed on Sunday in an Israeli airstrike on a training college near Gaza City being used to distribute aid, Palestinian witnesses said, as Israeli tanks pushed further into the southern city of Rafah.

title: Apple Holds Talks With Rival Meta Over Artificial Intelligence: Report
content: Apple is talking to major rival Meta about integrating the Facebook parent company's generative AI into its products, as it tries to catch up with rivals on artificial intelligence, the Wall Street Journal reported Sunday.
summary: Apple is talking to major rival Meta about integrating the Facebook parent company's generative AI into its products, as it tries to catch up with rivals on artificial intelligence, the Wall Street Journal reported Sunday.

title: Netanyahu Says Intense Fighting With Hamas In Rafah "About To End"
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Sunday that the Israeli military's heavy fighting against Hamas in the southern Gaza city of Rafah is nearly over.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Sunday that the Israeli military's heavy fighting against Hamas in the southern Gaza city of Rafah is nearly over.

title: Kanishka Bombing A Reminder Why Terrorism Shouldn't Be Tolerated: Minister
content: The Indian missions in Canadian capital Ottawa and Toronto city on Sunday marked the 39th anniversary of the 1985 Kanishka bombing in which 329 persons, including 86 children, on board an Air India lost their lives in one of the most heinous terror-r
summary: The Indian missions in Canadian capital Ottawa and Toronto city on Sunday marked the 39th anniversary of the 1985 Kanishka bombing in which 329 persons, including 86 children, on board an Air India lost their lives in one of the most heinous terror-r

title: Over 1,300 Deaths During Hajj Due To Heat, 83% Pilgrims Unregistered: Saudi
content: Saudi Arabia said Sunday that more than 1,300 faithful died during the hajj pilgrimage which took place during intense heat and that most of them who died did not have official permits.
summary: Saudi Arabia said Sunday that more than 1,300 faithful died during the hajj pilgrimage which took place during intense heat and that most of them who died did not have official permits.

title: Gaza War Blocks Exams And Shatters Palestinian Students' Dreams
content: Teenagers across the Gaza Strip should have been taking their final exams this month, a last hurdle before university and lifelong dreams, but the war in the Palestinian territory has crushed those hopes.
summary: Teenagers across the Gaza Strip should have been taking their final exams this month, a last hurdle before university and lifelong dreams, but the war in the Palestinian territory has crushed those hopes.

title: Gunmen Attack Churches, Synagogues In Russia; 8 Cops, Priest Killed
content: Gunmen attacked churches and synagogues in Russia's North Caucasus region of Dagestan on Sunday, killing at least eight police and national guard officers and a priest, officials said.
summary: Gunmen attacked churches and synagogues in Russia's North Caucasus region of Dagestan on Sunday, killing at least eight police and national guard officers and a priest, officials said.

title: French Feminists March Against Far Right With Days Before Vote
content: Thousands of people turned out in France on Sunday for feminist demonstrations against the far right, which is expected to come out on top in June 30 snap elections, as parties sought to shore up support with days to go.
summary: Thousands of people turned out in France on Sunday for feminist demonstrations against the far right, which is expected to come out on top in June 30 snap elections, as parties sought to shore up support with days to go.

title: 3 Wolves Brutally Attack 37-Year-Old Woman In Zoo Outside Paris: Report
content: Three wolves in a zoo outside Paris attacked a 37-year-old woman leaving her fighting for her life, a source familiar with the case and local prosecutors said.
summary: Three wolves in a zoo outside Paris attacked a 37-year-old woman leaving her fighting for her life, a source familiar with the case and local prosecutors said.

title: Israeli Forces Tie Wounded Palestinian To Jeep In West Bank Raid
content: Israeli troops tied a wounded Palestinian to a military vehicle during a raid in the occupied West Bank city of Jenin, the army said Sunday, admitting that soldiers had violated operational procedures.
summary: Israeli troops tied a wounded Palestinian to a military vehicle during a raid in the occupied West Bank city of Jenin, the army said Sunday, admitting that soldiers had violated operational procedures.

title: Hindujas Not Imprisoned, Human Trafficking Charges Dismissed: Spokesperson
content: Four members of Britain's richest family, the Hindujas, on Sunday said they have not been subjected to any imprisonment, conviction, sentence or detention.
summary: Four members of Britain's richest family, the Hindujas, on Sunday said they have not been subjected to any imprisonment, conviction, sentence or detention.

title: Israeli Defence Minister Heads To US For "Critical" Talks On Gaza War
content: Israel's Defence Minister Yoav Gallant was headed to Washington on Sunday for "critical" talks on the Gaza war raging since October 7 and surging cross-border tensions with Lebanon's Hezbollah movement.
summary: Israel's Defence Minister Yoav Gallant was headed to Washington on Sunday for "critical" talks on the Gaza war raging since October 7 and surging cross-border tensions with Lebanon's Hezbollah movement.

title: Heavy Rain Triggers Floods And Landslides In Switzerland
content: Emergency services with helicopters, drones and rescue dogs searched on Saturday for three people who were missing after violent downpours caused floods and landslides in southwestern Switzerland.
summary: Emergency services with helicopters, drones and rescue dogs searched on Saturday for three people who were missing after violent downpours caused floods and landslides in southwestern Switzerland.

title: Flights Cancelled At UK's 3rd-Busiest Airport After Power Cut
content: Flights at the UK's third-busiest airport were being delayed or cancelled Sunday after a major power cut, the airport operator said.
summary: Flights at the UK's third-busiest airport were being delayed or cancelled Sunday after a major power cut, the airport operator said.
